projects.name: From Baseline to DeepSeek - Single-GPU MoE Training Efficiency
projects.summary: Conducted a systems-level study of MoE training efficiency on resource-constrained hardware using the FineWeb-10B dataset, comparing naive PyTorch, ScatterMoE, and MegaBlocks architectures.
highlights: Reproduced a DeepSeek-inspired MoE architecture with shared experts and top-k routing, achieving a validation loss of 3.93 (1.5% improvement over dense models)
Optimized training throughput using ScatterMoE fused kernels, reducing memory footprint by 18% and decreasing latency by 16% against a Naive MoE implementation
Benchmarked implementation variants including MegaBlocks and ScatterMoE to identify VRAM bottlenecks in single-GPU scaling

projects.name: SmallGraphGCN - Accelerating GNN Training on Batched Small Graphs
projects.summary: Engineered a specialized GCN framework optimized for training on large batches of small sized graphs by eliminating excessive kernel launches by kernel fusion and edge-centric parallelism.
highlights: Wrote custom CUDA kernels for computation aggregation, resulting in a 68% reduction in kernel launches and 4.9x lower memory transfer overhead compared to PyG baselines
Maintained high model accuracy on molecular datasets while achieving substantial gains in training throughput
